Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: '...Are you going out tonight, Lucia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, we're all out of food, and it's too dangerous to go out during the day... There are the Corrupted, and the bad people...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But... I'm too scared to sleep here all alone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't worry. You'll be fine as long as you stay out of the dark.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Are there really monsters hiding in the dark?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You bet. There are super-duper scary monsters that'll gobble up little kids in one bite.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Can you hold my hand until I sleep? Just for tonight!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Didn't you say that last night?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia... Please?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sigh... Fine... But you gotta promise me you'll fall asleep quick.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Holding Lucia's hand, Luna closes her eyes... With her warm grip, the lonely, dark nights become way less scary."}
{3: "But no matter how long she waits, Luna never finds Lucia's hand."}
{3: "Luna feels around for her sister's hand. Finally grasping it, she discovers that it is now stiff and cold as ice."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory255.png'}
{3: 'Waking up from the hazy dream, Luna lifts up the hand she has been holding in the dim light, only to discover that it is in fact a hand—with nothing attached.'}
{3: 'A Corrupted hand! She has seen them wandering by the road. Lucia told her never to go near those monsters.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Ahhhhhhh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna throws the hand away and jumps back, accidentally tripping over something else on the ground.'}
{3: 'She can feel the agonizing pain from the wounds all over her body, but the real pain comes from a strange feeling in her mind.'}
{3: 'A peculiar noise clamors by her ears as if trying to tell her something. But upon listening more closely, she realizes it is just her own voice.'}
{3: 'Luna remembers that she secretly replaced her sister and went with the group of imposing men to become a "Construct".'}
{3: 'She does not know exactly what a so-called "Construct" is, only that if she becomes one, she and her sister can go to Babylonia. There they can eat their fill and take hot showers every day.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'All I remember was taking a pill the doctor gave me, then I fell asleep... After... after that...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna tries to recall what happened after she fell asleep, but her memory is all in disarray.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's... so dark here... I-is anybody there?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She tries to yell out, but is only answered by her echo.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Lucia... Sis... I'm scared... Where are you...?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'There is no warmth from a bonfire. No warmth from her sister. Only the cold, uncaring darkness.'}
{3: 'Her eyes brim with tears at the thought of her sister. She can barely stop herself from crying out loud.'}
{3: 'But right at that moment, a dull low roar comes from deep within the darkness. Luna clasps her mouth shut, too afraid to cry any longer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Is that what my sister warned me about—the monster?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The low roar and abrasive sound of dragging feet draw near... Closer and closer... Step by step...'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's... it's coming this way!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Lucia said that monsters only hide in the dark because they're afraid of the light. If only there was any...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna looks around to see a small hill emitting a blinding red light.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If I can just make it over there, the monster won't come any closer!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She makes up her mind, and runs with all her might toward the glowing red light.'}
{3: 'But as she approaches the red light, she finally discovers its source—'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'C-Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The upper half of a Corrupted lies on top of a waste pile. Although severely damaged, it still retains its functionality—noticing Luna, it turns its battered head toward her.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted reaches out toward Luna. All she can do is stand there helplessly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia... Where are you...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her eyes brim with tears once more. She has seen countless people ravaged by Corrupted. Those are the monsters that lurk in the dark, waiting to devour humanity.'}
{3: 'But to her surprise, the Corrupted does not attack her. It gradually relaxes its grip and becomes dormant once more.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz2101.jpg'}
{3: 'In the dim red glow of the Corrupted, Luna finally sees what has been causing her such pain—bullet holes on her body.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Is this... me...?'}
{3: 'Those imposing men said that she would grow a bit after her body was turned into a Construct to improve her combat ability.'}
{3: 'But what fills her with despair now is the glowing red light coming from her wounds—the same red light as the Corrupted.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: 'Corruption... critical... and rising!'}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: '—Take her out... before the virus spreads.'}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: '—Get to work. Kill the Corrupted and all the potential Corrupted.'}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: '—Throw them in the trash disposal facility where they belong.'}
{3: 'Luna stares into the eyes of the Corrupted, her vision gradually dissolves. The red light is rendered like ink until everything turned red.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'm a Corrupted? I'm a... monster?"}
{3: "The voice echoing in Luna's ear gradually becomes noisy but clear as it approaches, getting so close like it is whispering."}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: 'Desire... Impulse... A higher purpose...'}
{2: '(Noise)', 3: 'Destroy... humanity... for the sake of... humanity...'}
{3: 'In the glowing red light, Luna hears someone talking. But to her surprise, the voice comes from her own mouth.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory255.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Humanity must be filtered... There is no escape... There is no survival...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Ascend to a higher purpose... You are the agent... You are its will!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Luna... You can no longer return to your sister's side. You will never see her again...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'No! Lucia would never leave me. She promised.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia, if I ever get lost... If I ever lose my way, what should I do?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That time may come. We should be prepared...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I know, let's make a deal. If you ever get lost, just stay where you are and don't do anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't do anything...? Is that it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes... Because I'll be able to find you, wherever you are... Even if you become something else, I'll always be able to find you. I promise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I'll wait for you, Lucia... I'll always wait for you!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "The noise echoing in her ears gradually weakens, and the corruption's grip on Luna begins to loosen miraculously. Once the blood-red light dissipates, Luna falls into a deep slumber."}
{3: 'Silence fills the abandoned facility once more, punctuated only by occasional murmurs from Luna lost in her dreams.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Lucia... Sis...'}
